Academic Outputs

Organization of Workshop and Shared Tasks

  • Co-organizing the 2nd Deep Multimodal Generation and Retrieval (MMGR 2024) Workshop @ ACM Multimedia 2024

  • Co-organizing the Nominal Compound Chain Extraction (NCCE) Shared Task @ NLPCC 2024
  • Co-organizing the Dialogue-level Coreference Resolution and Relation Extraction Shared Task @ NLPCC 2024
  • Co-organizing the 1st Deep Multimodal Learning for Information Retrieval (MMIR 2023) Workshop @ ACM Multimedia 2023
  • Co-organizing the Conversational Aspect-based Sentiment Analysis (DiaASQ) Shared Task @ NLPCC 2023
